column5: Sounds like we have an opportunity for great Northern light show tonight.  Unfortunately, I suspect my view will be poor - but anyone who gets any shots be great to see them (here or in the photo section) hopefully I will be able to see some slight glints in the sky http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/northern-lights-to-dance-across-much-of-canada-tonight-1.2490272
I drove up to Gbay, then headed east, couldn't escape the clouds.

yeah, I was up every hour through the night checking, and Randy from Sturgeon pretty much the same. Bummer, would have been cool to see, I was hoping maybe you could have got some shots like those ones of the milky way from Nipigon; that  would have been awesome. maybe next time
